short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: rasa.io extension to add articles to your newsletter content pool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will allow you to automatically add articles to your upcoming rasa.io newsletter by simply clicking on the rasa icon as you're visiting the article's url.
